translation.en: This is Andrea reporting for What's At Heart!
translation.zh: 安茱莉亚正在为您报导《秘密新闻》

translation.en: The webcast that keeps you "Up-to-Date On All That's Great" in Heartlake High.
translation.zh: 这部网络广播节目帮助你了解 心湖城高中所有重大时事制作团队成员就在我身边

translation.en: I'm here with my crew... Emma on sound,
translation.zh: 我与制片组成员一起为您报导 音响师艾玛

translation.en: Mia on lights, my producer Stephanie, and cameraperson Olivia!
translation.zh: 灯光师米娅制片人丝蒂芬妮 和摄像师奥丽薇亚

translation.en: Today, the Science Room, where science nerd Jacob--
translation.zh: 今天我们要参观科学教室 -科学痴才雅各布...-别这样说

translation.en: -Hey! -Sorry.
translation.zh: -科学痴才雅各布...-别这样说 对不起 科学课学生雅各布专门为我们准备了一个实验

translation.en: Science student, Jacob, is preparing an experiment just for us.
translation.zh: 对不起 科学课学生雅各布专门为我们准备了一个实验

translation.en: Will it work? Will it change the face of science?
translation.zh: 实验会成功吗？它会改变科学现状吗？

translation.en: Or will it fail miserably, driving Jacob into a life of regret?
translation.zh: 或者实验会失败令雅各布遗憾终身？

translation.en: The entire city holds its breath!
translation.zh: 全市都屏住呼吸 静心等待！

translation.en: The thing you have to know about Andrea
translation.zh: 你们得知道 安茱莉亚

translation.en: is that she likes everything to be, well...dramatic.
translation.zh: 她喜欢...夸大其词

translation.en: Not a little dramatic, but eye-popping, intense, over-the-top dramatic.
translation.zh: 不止是稍微有点夸张 而是令人震惊 过火的夸张

translation.en: Especially when she's in front of the camera, which is every chance she gets.
translation.zh: 特别当她站在镜头前 虽然她一有机会就要做主持人

translation.en: And that's fine, most of the time.
translation.zh: 不过那样也没关系至少是大多数时候

translation.en: Oh, hi, Andrea. How nice to see you here.
translation.zh: 你好 安茱莉亚见到你真高兴

translation.en: What are we going to see, Jacob?
translation.zh: 告诉我们 我们即将见证什么实验 雅各布

translation.en: Will it be a new form of energy? A captured alien?
translation.zh: 是一种新型能量吗？被捉住的外星人？

translation.en: Or have you created life?
translation.zh: 或者你创造出了生命？

translation.en: It's two mints and some diet cola. Should make a nice fizz.
translation.zh: 两颗薄荷糖和一瓶低糖可乐 -应该能产生很多气泡-就这样吗？产生气泡？

translation.en: That's it? A "nice fizz"?
translation.zh: -应该能产生很多气泡-就这样吗？产生气泡？

translation.en: Pretty much.
translation.zh: 差不多吧

translation.en: Well, if two mints make a "nice fizz", what would a whole roll of them do?
translation.zh: 若两颗薄荷糖能产生很多气泡放入一堆薄荷糖会发生什么？

translation.en: Andrea! No!
translation.zh: 安茱莉亚！不要！

translation.en: Oopsie.
translation.zh: 糟糕

translation.en: This is Andrea. Signing off for What's At Heart.
translation.zh: 我是安茱莉亚今天的《秘密新闻》到此结束

translation.en: Er... Ha... And cut!
translation.zh: 停止拍摄！

translation.en: Cinnamon Sea Slugs?
translation.zh: 要不要尝尝肉桂海蛞蝓？

translation.en: -No, thanks. -I’ll pass.
translation.zh: -不用了 谢谢-不用了

translation.en: -Just had some for lunch. -Maybe later.
translation.zh: -刚刚吃过午餐-下次吧

translation.en: We shot this because Andrea thought we could add it to our webcast,
translation.zh: 我们拍摄这一段录像是因为安茱莉亚认为我们可以

translation.en: Our Valiant Struggle To Keep You Informed.
translation.zh: 把录像编辑到网络广播节目中《我们录制节目的花絮》

translation.en: It was originally called Andrea's Valiant Struggle, but we voted her down.
translation.zh: 实际上原本叫做《安茱莉亚录制节目的花絮》 但是我们投了反对票驳回了她取的名字

translation.en: So you need a new camera.
translation.zh: 所以你们需要一台新摄像机

translation.en: Didn't you lose a boom mike just last month doing your zoo special?
translation.zh: 你们上个月拍摄动物园专辑不是丢了一个吊杆麦克风吗？

translation.en: Principal Earhart, that wasn't totally my fault. Who knew warthogs eat metal?
translation.zh: 艾尔哈特校长那次并不完全是我的错 谁知道疣猪吃金属？

translation.en: Fine. All right, you'll have your camera.
translation.zh: 好吧 好吧 给你们换摄像机

translation.en: But this will have to be the last time.
translation.zh: 可是这次只能是最后一次了

translation.en: Our new Mayor has decided to cut back the school budget.
translation.zh: 我们的新市长决定缩减学校的经费

translation.en: Probably since his daughter didn't get elected Student Body President.
translation.zh: 也许是因为她女儿没被选为学生会主席

translation.en: Peu importe.
translation.zh: 没什么大不了的

translation.en: However, we may soon be forced to cut off funding for the webcast altogether,
translation.zh: 不过我们也许很快就不能资助网络广播节目

translation.en: maybe even the paper itself.
translation.zh: 也许甚至包括校报

translation.en: -What? No! No way! -You can’t!
translation.zh: -什么？不要！不行！-你不能这么做！

translation.en: -What about freedom of the press? -What about the public's right to know?
translation.zh: -新闻自由呢？-公众知情权呢？

translation.en: What about getting my face on camera every week?
translation.zh: 我每周都要上镜的 怎么办？

translation.en: We were in major shock. But we all know there's only one way to deal with trouble.
translation.zh: 我们大吃一惊 可是我们都知道应对困难只有一个办法

translation.en: Cupcake?
translation.zh: 要不要蛋糕？

translation.en: So is that it for our webcast?
translation.zh: 所以我们的网络广播节目就这样结束了吗？

translation.en: Well, let's face it, our ratings have been falling lately.
translation.zh: 面对现实吧 最近的收视率一直在下跌

translation.en: -There's too much competition on the web. -Tell me about it.
translation.zh: 网络上的竞争太激烈了 没错

translation.en: Seems like every student at Heartlake High has their own gossip blog.
translation.zh: 似乎心湖城高中的所有学生都有自己的八卦博客

translation.en: Last week, we got fewer hits than What's On The Bottom Of Matthew's Shoe?
translation.zh: 上周我们的网页点击数 还不如《马修的鞋底秘密》

translation.en: It was a very special episode.
translation.zh: 那一集是特辑

translation.en: We need to somehow get viewers watching again. But how?
translation.zh: 我们需要想办法吸引大家注意 可是我们该怎么做？

translation.en: Oh, I know! How about some cute kitten videos?
translation.zh: 我想到了！不如拍一些可爱的小猫视频？

translation.en: Right, the one thing the Internet needs more of is cute kittens.
translation.zh: 对 网络最缺可爱小猫视频了

translation.en: No, we need something special, something spectacular,
translation.zh: 不 我们需要特别且引人入胜的内容

translation.en: something that no teen would dare miss.
translation.zh: 青少年都不会想错过的节目

translation.en: I've got it! A full-hour special, Birth Of A Star!
translation.zh: 我想到了！一个小时的特辑《明星的诞生之路》

translation.en: Not another documentary about yourself, Andrea.
translation.zh: 不要再拍关于你的纪录片了安茱莉亚

translation.en: But there's so much more to tell!
translation.zh: 可是我还有很多精彩故事

translation.en: Actually, I kind of like the idea of a documentary.
translation.zh: 实际上我挺喜欢拍摄纪录片这个主意

translation.en: But isn't there anyone else you think is interesting?
translation.zh: 不过你就想不到其他有意思的人吗？

translation.en: -Livi! -Perfect!
translation.zh: 莉薇！ -完美！-好极了！

translation.en: -Awesome! -Yes!
translation.zh: -完美！-好极了！

translation.en: That’s brilliant!
translation.zh: -我喜欢这个主意！-真棒！

translation.en: A documentary on the world's biggest pop star.
translation.zh: 全世界最受欢迎歌星的纪录片

translation.en: -It would draw viewers like flies! -You really think she'd do it?
translation.zh: 一定会吸引很多观众！ 你真的认为她会同意吗？

translation.en: Are you kidding? She'd do anything for me.
translation.zh: 你开玩笑吗？她愿意为我做任何事

translation.en: Forget it! Not a chance! Not in this lifetime! Absolutely not!
translation.zh: 不可能！不行！永远都不行！绝对不行！

translation.en: So you're saying you'll think about it?
translation.zh: 所以你是说 你会考虑？

translation.en: No! I can't stand documentaries about pop stars.
translation.zh: 不 我受不了歌星纪录片

translation.en: They're always so very, awfully fake.
translation.zh: 总是非常非常虚假

translation.en: Oh, you're so right! But ours will be different!
translation.zh: 你说的太对了可是我们的纪录片不一样

translation.en: We'll show the unvarnished truth, the real Livi, warts and all!
translation.zh: 我们会毫无修饰地展示真实的莉薇 包括肉疣

translation.en: -I don't have warts. -We can fake that-- Kidding!
translation.zh: -我身上没长肉疣-我们可以造假的 开玩笑的

translation.en: Livi, we swear we'll keep it honest!
translation.zh: 莉薇 我们发誓会保持真实

translation.en: And you'd be helping us save our webcast.
translation.zh: 你能帮我们挽救我们的网络广播节目

translation.en: This could be bigger than our warthog special!
translation.zh: 这次比我们的疣猪特辑更重要

translation.en: Think of it this way. Please, please, please.
translation.zh: 这样想吧 求你了 求你了

translation.en: Oh, all right, I give up! I'll do it!
translation.zh: 好吧 我投降 我答应你们

translation.en: But only if you promise to keep it real. Nothing phony.
translation.zh: 不过你们必须保证真实不准弄虚作假

translation.en: -Yay! Thank You, Livi! -Thanks so much!
translation.zh: -谢谢你 莉薇-非常感谢

translation.en: I knew she'd say yes! I have a way with other super-talents.
translation.zh: 我就知道她会同意的 我擅长与其他超级有天赋的人打交道

translation.en: This will be the biggest web sensation since Grouchy Cat!
translation.zh: 这次会是《不开心的猫》之后最受欢迎的网络节目

translation.en: But you've got to stay out of the way!
translation.zh: 不过你们不能碍事！

translation.en: I’m gonna be super-busy all week rehearsing for my new video.
translation.zh: 我这一周为新音乐录像彩排会非常忙

translation.en: It's the biggest, most important one of my career, so I really need to concentrate.
translation.zh: 这是我的职业生涯最重要的一部音乐录像 所以我真的需要集中注意力

translation.en: You won't even notice we're there.
translation.zh: 我们保证 你甚至不会注意到我们在你周围

translation.en: Livi, you're on in 60 seconds!
translation.zh: 莉薇 一分钟后上台

translation.en: ♪ Girls, come on, turn it up And sing along ♪
translation.zh: 女孩们 调高音量大家一起唱

translation.en: ♪ Oh, we can march to the beat ♪
translation.zh: 我们伴着鼓点的节奏

translation.en: ♪ Oh, girls We can now see it now ♪
translation.zh: 女孩们 我们现在明白了

translation.en: ♪ Don't doubt yourself Oh, girl ♪
translation.zh: 不要怀疑自己

translation.en: ♪ So let's get up, up, up ♪
translation.zh: 起来 起来 起来

translation.en: ♪ Girls, oh ♪
translation.zh: 女孩们

translation.en: ♪ You know that you can do more ♪
translation.zh: 你知道你能做得更好

translation.en: ♪ When you feel like dancing with us ♪
translation.zh: 当你想与我们一起跳舞

translation.en: ♪ You know you are, you know you are Hey, hey, hey ♪
translation.zh: 你知道你想跳舞你知道你想跳舞

translation.en: -And that's when the real trouble started. -Big-time.
translation.zh: 那时真正的麻烦开始出现了 大麻烦

translation.en: Yes, folks, glamour starts early
translation.zh: 没错 我们一大早就为您记录

translation.en: in Livi's super-fantastic, fabulous, at-home-pop-star life.
translation.zh: 莉薇超级精彩的巨星家居生活

translation.en: Whoops. My bad.
translation.zh: 糟糕 怪我

translation.en: And mine.
translation.zh: 是我的错

translation.en: Here it comes, fans! The magic moment when Livi wakes up!
translation.zh: 马上就要开始了 粉丝们莉薇清醒的神奇时刻

translation.en: -Huh? -Livi, Livi, it's us!
translation.zh: -什么事？-莉薇 莉薇 是我们

translation.en: The documentary, remember?
translation.zh: 我们在拍纪录片 记得吗？

translation.en: Oh, right. Gotta go.
translation.zh: 对了 我得走了

translation.en: And cut.
translation.zh: 停

translation.en: Livi is now brushing her very own teeth, every one of them.
translation.zh: 莉薇正在刷牙 一颗都没漏掉

translation.en: -Can you describe how you're feeling? -[mouth full, mumbling]
translation.zh: 莉薇 你能描述你的感受吗？

translation.en: Yes, you heard it from her very own foam-covered lips!
translation.zh: 对 声音是从她沾满泡沫的嘴唇中发出来的

translation.en: She spit! Did we get that?
translation.zh: 她吐出了漱口水拍下来了吗？

translation.en: We're watching the fabulous Livi eating the secret breakfast of superstars!
translation.zh: 我们正在观看美丽的莉薇享用超级巨星秘密早餐

translation.en: Share with your fans what that is.
translation.zh: 你能告诉你的粉丝们你在吃什么早餐吗？

translation.en: Stale potato chips?
translation.zh: 不新鲜的薯片？

translation.en: So there you have it. The magic just keeps on coming!
translation.zh: 你们知道了吧精彩内容不会间断

translation.en: What other glamorous moments are in store?
translation.zh: 还会有什么精彩瞬间呢？

translation.en: That's right, folks.
translation.zh: 没错 伙计们

translation.en: That's Livi's own famous cover-girl hair she's pulling out of that drain!
translation.zh: 莉薇从排水管拽出了她著名的封面女郎造型紫色头发

translation.en: We were getting desperate. Livi's super-glam home life
translation.zh: 我们变得绝望了 莉薇超级精彩的家居生活其实

translation.en: was more boring than What's On The Bottom Of Matthew's Shoe?
translation.zh: 莉薇超级精彩的家居生活其实 比《马修的鞋底秘密》还要无聊

translation.en: Remember Matthew’s Christmas Special?
translation.zh: 记得马修的圣诞节特辑吗？

translation.en: Now that's entertainment.
translation.zh: 那才有趣

translation.en: We finally got a tiny break when Livi's choreographer came by the house
translation.zh: 我们终于走了一点好运 莉薇的编舞师来她家

translation.en: to go over her dance routine for the music video.
translation.zh: 向她讲解音乐录像的舞蹈编排

translation.en: Now we jazz-walk over to the big prop staircase,
translation.zh: 现在我们扭着走上大楼梯道具

translation.en: then work our way up the stairs, like this.
translation.zh: 然后像这样上楼梯

translation.en: -And jazz hands! -Tada!
translation.zh: -摆出这样的手势-看这里！

translation.en: -Oh, my gosh! -Can you move?
translation.zh: -天啊！-你还好吗？别动 天啊

translation.en: Sorry, I didn't mean to.
translation.zh: -对不起 我不是故意的-对

translation.en: Come on, Brent, I'm taking you to the doctor.
translation.zh: 走吧 布兰特我带你去看医生

translation.en: And I'll speak to you later.
translation.zh: 我待会再找你们谈话

translation.en: Okay, Olivia. Cut.
translation.zh: 好了 奥丽薇亚 别拍了

translation.en: At least we have a dramatic scene to the documentary.
translation.zh: 至少我们的纪录片有了一段精彩内容

translation.en: Actually, Andrea, I missed it.
translation.zh: 安茱莉亚 我其实没拍下来

translation.en: What? You missed it?
translation.zh: 什么？你没拍到？

translation.en: I suppose it would be a lot to ask him to do that again?
translation.zh: 我猜请他再摔一次会有点过分吧

translation.en: -I hope he's okay! -I can't believe it.
translation.zh: -我希望他没事-我不敢相信

translation.en: We missed the one and only exciting thing that's happened since we got here.
translation.zh: 我们竟然没拍下那一幕 那是自从我们到这里后发生的唯一一件刺激的事

translation.en: If you don't count when Cookie upchucked the chips.
translation.zh: 那是自从我们到这里后发生的唯一一件刺激的事 如果你不算曲奇吐出薯片的那一幕

translation.en: There's got to be a way.
translation.zh: 一定有办法的

translation.en: Or maybe we didn't miss it!
translation.zh: 或者也许我们并没有错过

translation.en: Afraid we did. The camera was pointing everywhere but at him.
translation.zh: 恐怕我们错过了 摄像机镜头并没有对着他

translation.en: That was then. But what if we re-stage it?
translation.zh: 当时是错过了 不过如果我们重演那一幕呢？

translation.en: You mean fake it? You think that's honest?
translation.zh: 你是说 伪造？你觉得那样算是真实记录吗？

translation.en: Of course it is! I mean, it really did happen, right?
translation.zh: 当然算了那件事确实发生过了 对吗？

translation.en: So it's not like we’re making stuff up.
translation.zh: 所以我们又不是捏造事实

translation.en: I did see a dress dummy in the closet.
translation.zh: 我在衣橱里看到一个假人模特

translation.en: He'll need a head, there's a melon in the fridge.
translation.zh: 他需要一个脑袋冰箱里有一个甜瓜

translation.en: I'll go see what clothes are in her closet!
translation.zh: 我去她的衣橱里找衣服

translation.en: But... But...
translation.zh: 可是...可是...

translation.en: There! Did he have a dimple?
translation.zh: 好了 他有酒窝吗？

translation.en: Emma, we won't see him that close. It'll be really fast.
translation.zh: 艾玛 我们不会拍特写滚下楼梯的速度会很快

translation.en: We'll edit it together with the real guy later.
translation.zh: 待会拍摄真人 最后编辑

translation.en: Everyone ready? Olivia, be sure to jiggle the camera for realism.
translation.zh: 大家准备好了吗？ 奥丽薇亚 轻摇摄像机这样拍得更真实

translation.en: And action!
translation.zh: 开拍！

translation.en: And cut! It's good!
translation.zh: 停！很好！

translation.en: This'll be perfect for the webcast!
translation.zh: 正适合放在网络广播节目中

translation.en: So that's how our real-life documentary started to get a little less real.
translation.zh: 所以我们的真实生活纪录片变得不再真实了

translation.en: It might've been okay if Andrea had left it there.
translation.zh: 如果安茱莉亚能就此罢手也许不会有事

translation.en: But Andrea doesn't know how to do things halfway.
translation.zh: 可是安茱莉亚从来都不会半途而废

translation.en: Our guest is the one and only Natasha, hairdresser to the stars!
translation.zh: 我们的嘉宾是独一无二的巨星发型师 娜塔莎

translation.en: Her very next appointment... Livi!
translation.zh: 她的下一位预约客人是莉薇

translation.en: Is Livi always this late, Natasha?
translation.zh: 莉薇总是迟到这么久吗娜塔莎？

translation.en: No, darling!
translation.zh: 不是的 亲爱的

translation.en: Superstars are never late, it's the rest of us who are early!
translation.zh: 超级巨星从不迟到是其他人早到了

translation.en: Her last 2:00 started at 6:00.
translation.zh: 她上一次两点钟的预约从六点就开始了

translation.en: Today, our viewers will get to watch you work
translation.zh: 今天我们的观众们能欣赏

translation.en: your styling magic for Livi's new music video!
translation.zh: 你为莉薇的新音乐录像施展你的塑造发型魔法

translation.en: It will be the thrill of your life, darling.
translation.zh: 没错 那会是你一生见过的最刺激的画面 亲爱的

translation.en: But first, I must go and prepare my secret formulas.
translation.zh: 不过我先要去准备我的秘密配方了

translation.en: And cut!
translation.zh: 停！

translation.en: Okay, let's set up here at Livi's private chair so...
translation.zh: 好的 我们把镜头对准莉薇的私人化妆椅...

translation.en: Natasha! It's your phone!
translation.zh: 娜塔莎 你的手机铃声响了

translation.en: Hey, it's Livi calling.
translation.zh: 是莉薇打来的电话

translation.en: Hi, Livi, it's me, Olivia! Really? You can't?
translation.zh: 你好 莉薇 是我 奥丽薇亚 真的吗？你来不了了？

translation.en: Sure, I'll tell her.
translation.zh: 好的 我会告诉她

translation.en: She has to cancel the appointment.
translation.zh: 她得取消预约

translation.en: Well, that's that. Might as well pack it up.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们收拾东西走吧

translation.en: Wait! We can still do this!
translation.zh: 等等 我们还是可以拍摄的

translation.en: But Natasha will see I'm not Livi!
translation.zh: 可是娜塔莎会发现我不是莉薇

translation.en: -Not with this, she won't. -Andrea.
translation.zh: 这样就不会发现了 安茱莉亚

translation.en: It's not like we're faking it, exactly, Livi did have an appointment.
translation.zh: 我们又没有捏造事实 莉薇确实预约了做发型谁会知道真相？

translation.en: Who's gonna know?
translation.zh: 莉薇确实预约了做发型谁会知道真相？

translation.en: Livi! Darling! You look fabulous!
translation.zh: 莉薇 亲爱的 你漂亮极了

translation.en: What is your secret?
translation.zh: 你的美丽秘诀是什么？

translation.en: Oh, that's right, it's me!
translation.zh: 没错 就是我！

translation.en: Now, let's make magic!
translation.zh: 让我施展魔法吧

translation.en: And so it went. By the time we got to Livi's music video,
translation.zh: 所以事情就是这样发展的等我们到了莉薇音乐录像片场

translation.en: Andrea's definition of keeping it real had stretched to the breaking point.
translation.zh: 安茱莉亚对于真实的定义已经模糊不清了

translation.en: One-two, one-two.
translation.zh: 一 二 一 二

translation.en: Here we are, up close and personal with Livi's private make-up expert!
translation.zh: 我们正在采访莉薇的私人化妆师

translation.en: So, what's it like to work on such a famous face as Livi's?
translation.zh: 那么为莉薇这样的明星化妆是什么感觉？

translation.en: You can tell us, what's her favourite shade of lip gloss?
translation.zh: 你可以告诉我们 她最爱的唇彩是什么颜色的吗？

translation.en: Aren't you her make-up artist?
translation.zh: 你不是她的化妆师吗？

translation.en: Cut!
translation.zh: 停！

translation.en: We can fix it in editing. Leave out the bucket. Nobody has to know.
translation.zh: 不用担心 后期编辑的时候可以补救 剪辑掉拖把和桶不需要让别人知道

translation.en: This is ridiculous! This Livi documentary has nothing to do with Livi.
translation.zh: 安茱莉亚 这样太荒唐了 这部莉薇的纪录片与莉薇毫无关系

translation.en: Whatever happened to the unvarnished truth?
translation.zh: 不是说我们要拍摄毫无修饰的真相吗？

translation.en: I varnished it a little. Come on, they do it all the time on TV!
translation.zh: 所以我稍微修饰了一番拜托 电视上都是这么做的

translation.en: No, I think Olivia's right. We promised Livi that we'd keep it real.
translation.zh: 不 我认为奥丽薇亚说得对 我们答应莉薇不会弄虚作假

translation.en: But Andrea's got a point. We also need to keep it exciting and fun!
translation.zh: 可是安茱莉亚说的有道理 影片也需要刺激有趣

translation.en: -And completely phony?! -I suppose you could do better!
translation.zh: -还要完全虚假吗？-我猜你能做得更好

translation.en: Anybody could. You need to stick to the facts!
translation.zh: 任何人都能做到你只需要忠于事实

translation.en: Then be my guest! We'll make our documentary and you make yours!
translation.zh: 那你请便吧！ 我们拍我们的纪录片你们拍你们的纪录片

translation.en: -Fine! -Fine!
-Well, Emma? -Are you with us or them?
translation.zh: -艾玛？-你跟她们还是跟着我们？

translation.en: -I... -I think she's going to explode.
translation.zh: 我... 我觉得她要爆炸了

translation.en: -I'll get sound for both teams! -Whatever.
translation.zh: -我为两个队伍录音-随便了

translation.en: Great. Now what are we gonna do for a video camera?
translation.zh: 好极了 我们要去哪里找摄像机？

translation.en: I'll use my cell phone. It'll look even more documentary-ish.
translation.zh: 我用我的手机拍摄这样看上去更像纪录片

translation.en: -Okay, everyone, showtime! Quiet on set! -They're starting! Come on!
translation.zh: 好了 到演出时间了大家保持安静 他们要开始了 快来

translation.en: Cue playback! And action!
translation.zh: 开始播放音乐 开拍！

translation.en: -I can't get a clear shot. -Get closer. Look at Olivia and Mia.
translation.zh: 我拍不清楚 我们得靠近点看看奥丽薇亚和米娅

translation.en: -Incoming wardrobe rack! -What?!
translation.zh: -衣架过来了-什么？

translation.en: Sorry!
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Where'd that come from?
translation.zh: 那是从哪里来的？

translation.en: What's going on out there? Cut!
translation.zh: 怎么回事？停止拍摄！

translation.en: -What? What happened? -It's not my fault!
translation.zh: -怎么回事？发生了什么事？-不是我的错

translation.en: Cut! Someone unplug the fan!
translation.zh: 停！快点拔掉风扇的插头！

translation.en: Cut! Cut! Cut! Will someone call security! Get those girls off the set!
translation.zh: 停！停！停！ 找保安 把那些女孩赶出片场

translation.en: Take cover!
translation.zh: 躲起来！

translation.en: Cut?
translation.zh: 停止拍摄？

translation.en: We told Livi she wouldn't even notice us.
translation.zh: 我们对莉薇说她不会注意到我们在她周围

translation.en: She noticed.
translation.zh: 她注意到了

translation.en: So that was the end of our documentary shoot,
translation.zh: 所以我们的纪录片拍摄工作到此结束

translation.en: -along with our webcast. -And our friendship with Livi.
translation.zh: -《秘密新闻》完了-我们与莉薇也断交了

translation.en: Not only were we banned from her music video set, what was left of it,
translation.zh: 我们不仅被禁止进入她的音乐录像拍摄片场 或者说是片场废墟

translation.en: but she forbid us from coming within 50 feet of her.
translation.zh: 而且她不准我们出现在她周围九米以内的地方

translation.en: Or any place she's ever been.
translation.zh: 或是去她去过的地方

translation.en: -Or might ever go. -Ever.
translation.zh: -或是去她也许会去的地方-期限是永远

translation.en: Well, there's nothing that sprinkles can't fix.
translation.zh: 蛋糕能够解决所有问题

translation.en: The worst part is, we let ourselves down. We said we were gonna keep it real.
translation.zh: 最糟糕的是我们让自己失望了 我们说要拍摄真实纪录片

translation.en: It's all my fault.
translation.zh: 全是我的错我的精彩纪录片变成了

translation.en: My brilliant documentary turned out to be as fake as Livi said it would.
translation.zh: 全是我的错我的精彩纪录片变成了 莉薇所说的虚假纪录片

translation.en: I'm the one who split us up, when we know we always work better as a team.
translation.zh: 可是是我拆散了团队 而我们都知道我们合作时更出色

translation.en: All we've got left now is egg on our faces,
translation.zh: 我们现在脸上沾着鸡蛋

translation.en: sprinkles in our teeth, and pieces of useless video.
translation.zh: 牙齿里卡着糖屑还有一些没用的录像

translation.en: -Mostly of things we blew up. -Kind of like a collage.
translation.zh: 大多是我们搞砸的画面 有点像是拼贴画

translation.en: Yes! Exactly like a collage! I've got an idea!
translation.zh: 没错！就像拼贴画！我有主意了！

translation.en: No, no, no! Listen. I swear this one will work.
translation.zh: 不 听我说我发誓这次会成功的

translation.en: [Livi] Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不会吧

translation.en: Please! It'll just take a minute!
translation.zh: 求你了 只需要一分钟！

translation.en: Fine. One minute.
translation.zh: 好吧 一分钟

translation.en: We put this music video together, since we kind of blew up yours.
translation.zh: 我们自己拼出了这部音乐录像因为我们搞砸了你的录影工作

translation.en: -I love it. -[dog barks]
translation.zh: 我很喜欢

translation.en: Speaking on behalf of my friends and myself, I'd just like to say, yay!
translation.zh: 我代表我和我的朋友们 我想大声欢呼

translation.en: You should be proud.
translation.zh: 你们应该感到自豪

translation.en: Despite the... mass destruction that went into making it,
translation.zh: 尽管你们制作纪录片时搞了很多破坏

translation.en: this is the most inventive video I've seen in years.
translation.zh: 这是我多年来见过的最有创意的音乐录像

translation.en: And much more exciting than the one I was making.
translation.zh: 比我当时制作的音乐录像更有趣

translation.en: -So you don't hate us anymore? -And we can come within 50 feet of you?
translation.zh: 你不讨厌我们了吗？ 我们可以出现在你周围九米以内的地方了吗？

translation.en: I'll do better than that. I'm giving you permission
translation.zh: 我有一个更好的提议 我允许你们在《秘密新闻》中

translation.en: to premiere this video on your What's At Heart webcast!
translation.zh: 我允许你们在《秘密新闻》中 首播这部音乐录像

translation.en: -Stellar! -Oh, wow!
translation.zh: -好极了！-太棒了！

translation.en: The premiere of Livi's newest video! We'll get millions of hits!
translation.zh: 莉薇最新音乐录像的首播一定会有数百万人点击！

translation.en: This'll be even bigger than Matthew's Shoe!
translation.zh: 这次的视频会比《马修的鞋底秘密》更火

translation.en: So who's hungry? I have a melon in the fridge.
translation.zh: 有谁饿了？我的冰箱里有一个甜瓜

translation.en: Not anymore.
translation.zh: 已经没有了

translation.en: It worked! What's At Heart was saved!
translation.zh: -成功了-《秘密新闻》得救了

translation.en: We even had enough good footage left over to put together the documentary.
translation.zh: 而且我们甚至还有足够多的清晰录像 可以拼成这部纪录片

translation.en: -We call it Keeping It Real. -Or How Not To Make A Documentary.
translation.zh: -我们称之为《保持真实》-或《拍纪录片的错误做法》
